title: I'm BACK! With a Vengeance ...
description:
Another "family friendly" drag show messed with Texas over the weekend, and Team LWC was on hand. SPOILER: It was less "family friendly" and more "demonic." Also, Mark Zuckerberg had some eye-opening things to say about the FBI's control over social media. And why is Netflix protecting a trans criminal in the Manti Te'o documentary? #Drag ##FBI #MantiTeo

Come See Standup! - http://www.louderwithcrowder.com/tour

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/ 

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/back-with-a-vengeance
